title: Fairly standard sans serif
content:
Looking to identify the "2013" and "Font Trends" which I think are the same. Looks familiar, but I haven't been able to place it. Any ideas?

Thanks in advance!

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131015042504im_/http:/typophile.com/files/4526_6675.pic%20(1).jpg)
author: elias_stein

comments.content: As expected, this one gave me some hard time to identify but I guess I finally got it. Should be [Montserrat](http://web.archive.org/web/20131015042504/http:/www.google.com/fonts/specimen/Montserrat).
